price: Bityo, (yewe Muhamadi) komeza wibutse! Mu by’ukuri ku bw’ingabire za Nyagasani wawe (zo kuba warahawe ubutumwa), ntabwo uri umupfumu cyangwa umusazi (nk’uko babivuga).
arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٖ وَلَا مَجۡنُونٍ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fadhakkir famā anta biniʿ'mati rabbika bikāhinin walā majnūnin
